name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control: Fast compact vertical tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast compact vertical tabs at side panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast compact vertical tabs at side panel. A more convenient option for using tabs

More features coming soon.

Version history:
1.6.0: New tab button
1.5.0: Show and change state of audible tabs
1.4.0: Unloaded tabs are greyscale
1.3.0: Drag and drop of tabs
1.2.0: Scroll to current tab
